Articles.Content:
Ok, I just had a funny thought...

Let's say you our going into a final battle that will result (though you don't know it at the time) in your own demise. What music would you want to have playing during the battle? For me, it would be Vector to the Heavens. It is a gentle, sad, and climactic music.

you want gentle, sad and climactic?

**Twilight Of The Gods : Siegfried's Death And Funeral March WWV 86d - Richard Wagner**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wXh5JprKqiU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T18:12:21Z" title="03/11/2015 06:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by segaprophet**
